trans-unit.id: Unfortunately there was a problem processing your payment.
trans-unit.source: Unfortunately there was a problem processing your payment.
trans-unit.target: За съжаление възникна проблем при обработката на вашето плащане.

trans-unit.id: Please click here to try again.
trans-unit.source: Please click here to try again.
trans-unit.target: Моля, кликнете тук, за да опитате отново.
